snippet.title: Tales of the Forgotten - Official Horror Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Experience 3 terrifying short stories about ghosts that haunt ordinary locations. Unlock multiple endings and discover the secret of the forgotten ghosts.
Coming in early 2025. Wishlist now on Steam.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3157310/Tales_of_the_Forgotten/
